mapper.select: SELECT RED.VALOR_INDICADOR AS VALOR_INDICADOR, RED.VARIACION_ABSOLUTA AS VARIACION_ABSOLUTA, RED.VARIACION_RELATIVA AS VARIACION_RELATIVA, RED.FRECUENCIA AS FRECUENCIA, RED.INDICADOR_ID AS INDICADOR_ID, RED.VARIABLE_ID AS VARIABLE_ID, RED.ESTADO AS ESTADO, 'variable'||VIC.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AS VARIABLE_DESC, 'variable'||VIC.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID||'.codigo'||VIC.CODIGO AS ESTADO_DESC FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_ESTADOS_DEC RED INNER JOIN MD_VARS_INF VI ON VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = RED.VARIABLE_ID INNER JOIN MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC ON VIC.CODIGO = RED.ESTADO AND VIC.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AND RED.INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_ESTADOS_DEC
